snippet: The patience of General Manager Sandy Alderson and Manager Terry Collins is growing thin where the Mets’ young shortstop Ruben Tejada is concerned.
abstract: New York Mets general manager Sandy Alderson and manager Terry Collins voice frustration with once-promising shortstop Ruben Tejada, who remains exiled in minors following number of disappointing missteps.
lead_paragraph: The patience of General Manager Sandy Alderson and Manager Terry Collins is growing thin where the Mets’ young shortstop Ruben Tejada is concerned.

headline.main: Criticism by Alderson and Collins Is the Latest Setback for Tejada
headline.print_headline: Criticism by Alderson and Collins Is the Latest Setback for Tejada
